detaileddescription.para: W600 uses 4 Bits for the Priority Levels
Set to 1 if different SysTick Config is used
bit field of the lcd gate control in CLK gating register

briefdescription.para: This function is used to write value to register or memory.
This function is used to read value from register or memory.

memberdef.argsstring: (volatile unsigned int addr, unsigned int bit, unsigned int val)
memberdef.name: tls_bitband_write

briefdescription.para: This function is used to write specified bit through bit-band alias region.

parameterdescription.para: 32-bit aligned byte address where the bit exists.
The value that the bit is set to, 0 or 1.

simplesect.para: Only when bit-band mechnism is supported, you can use it

memberdef.argsstring: (volatile unsigned int addr, unsigned int bit)
memberdef.name: tls_bitband_read

briefdescription.para: This function is used to read a single bit from address by bit-band alias region.

parameterdescription.para: 32-bit aligned byte address where the bit exists

simplesect.para: Only when bit-band mechnism is supported, you can use it
